ValidationRule.description: RCI Cases must have a deputy assigned by the time Case Status = Under Investigation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (RecordType.DeveloperName="RCI") && ((ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Under Investigation")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Pending Settlement")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Hearing")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Conference")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Report Submitted")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Appealed")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Awaiting Compliance")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Law School Referral")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Closed - No further action")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Closed - JEU Referral")) || (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Closed - Enforcement Legal"))) && ISBLANK(Assigned_Deputy__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please assign a Deputy before changing the Case Status
